pageProduct.name: Alfree Toothpaste Charcoal Plain Whitening 80g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

alfree whitening toothpaste is free from flavours, colours, mint, artificial sweeteners and sugar as well as being fluoride, SLS and paraben free. Many with allergies cannot use coconut derived charcoal, so we use allergy friendly activated bamboo charcoal for salicylate free tooth whitening.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua) Calcium Carbonate Sorbitol Glycerin Silica Charcoal Powder Hydroxyacetophenone Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate 1,2-Hexanediol Caprylyl Glycol Sodium Magnesium Silicate Cellulose Gum
